title: Home Assistant
appdescription: Open source home automation that puts local control and privacy first. Powered by a worldwide community of tinkerers and DIY enthusiasts.

title: Portainer
appdescription: Portainer is a simple management solution for Docker. Easily manage your Docker hosts and Docker Swarm clusters via Portainer web user interface.

title: Pi-hole Main
appdescription: Pi-hole is a Linux network-level advertisement and internet tracker blocking application which acts as a DNS sinkhole, intended for use on a private network.

title: Pi-hole Slave
appdescription: Pi-hole is a Linux network-level advertisement and internet tracker blocking application which acts as a DNS sinkhole, intended for use on a private network.

title: Proxmox
appdescription: Proxmox Virtual Environment is an open-source server virtualization environment. It allows deployment and management of virtual machines and containers

title: Synology
appdescription: Synology is a popular NAS appliance

title: Guacamole
appdescription: Apache Guacamole is a clientless remote desktop gateway. It supports standard protocols like VNC, RDP, and SSH.

title: GitHub
appdescription: GitHub brings together the world's largest community of developers to discover, share, and build better software.

title: Uptime Kuma
appdescription: It is a self-hosted monitoring tool like "Uptime Robot".

title: Pi.Alert
appdescription:
WIFI / LAN intruder detector.

Scan the devices connected to your WIFI / LAN and alert you the connection of unknown devices. It also warns if a "always connected" devices disconnects.

title: Code server
appdescription: code-server is VS Code running on a remote server, accessible through the browser.
